route1_to_pallet.method: Walk south at x=10 past y=35. Map edge transition.

pallet_to_route1.method: Walk north at x=10-13 past y=0. Gap in fence at x=10-13.

route1_to_viridian.method: Walk north past y=0 on Route 1.

oaks_lab.enter: walk up into door from y=12. Approach via east side x=17.

route1.notes: y=0 north to Viridian, y=35 south to Pallet

mechanics: Ledges are one-way: can jump south, cannot climb north
Building doors: walk UP into the door tile to enter
Exit buildings: walk DOWN to the door mat / bottom of room
Map transitions: walk off the edge of the map in the connection direction
Tall grass: random wild encounters when walking through
Dialogue: press B to dismiss text boxes before moving
Battle menu: FIGHT is top-left (default), RUN is bottom-right
lessons_learned: Route 1 south exit to Pallet: x=10, walk past y=35 (NOT y=31)
Pallet Town north exit to Route 1: x=10-13, walk past y=0
Viridian City old man blocks north path until Oak's Parcel is delivered
The 0xD125 text detection RAM address is broken (always reads 1)
If stuck at same position for 3+ decisions, the approach is wrong — don't repeat it
Map edge transitions happen at y=0 (north) or y=max (south), not before
Brute-force scanning wastes decisions — use known coordinates from knowledge file

battle_strategy.general: Use Tackle (move 0) for everything early game
